predicate.note: Frames file for 'misspend' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: spend inappropriately, waste

example.name: only in passive?
example.text: The state has sued these charities in state court, complaining that much of the money was grossly misspent *trace*; 82%, says Mr. Ormstedt, went to fund raisers and most of the rest to the people who ran the charities and to their relatives -- for fur coats, trips to Florida, Lucullan restaurant tabs.

example.name: active?
example.text: John misspent his youth learning classical languages.

roleset.note: That doesn't sound entirely right to me.
